default.title: Roof Visible Damage
default.description: Check for cracked tiles, holes, or missing roof elements

default.title: Exterior Walls Condition
default.description: Assess visible exterior walls from outside photos

apartment.title: Balcony Safety
apartment.description: Inspect balcony railings, flooring, and enclosure for defects

villa.title: Landscape Condition
villa.description: Evaluate visible lawn, garden beds, and hardscape condition

default.title: Floor Condition
default.description: Evaluate visible flooring for scratches, stains, or damage

bathroom.title: Mirror Condition
bathroom.description: Check if bathroom mirrors are intact and clean

kitchen.title: Countertop Condition
kitchen.description: Check if kitchen countertop surface is in good shape

bedroom.title: Curtains / Blinds Condition
bedroom.description: Check if curtains or blinds exist and their condition

custom_items.title: Fridge Door Condition
custom_items.description: Check fridge door appearance for dents or rust

custom_items.title: Upholstery Condition
custom_items.description: Check sofa fabric or leather for visible wear
